commands.title: Azure Pipeline Studio: Show Rendered YAML
Azure Pipeline Studio: Configure Resource Locations

azurePipelineStudio.format.blankLinesBet.description: Number of blank lines between root-level sections (trigger, variables, resources, etc.).

azurePipelineStudio.format.firstBlockBla.description: Ensure the first top-level stages/jobs/steps block is preceded by this many blank lines.

azurePipelineStudio.format.forceQuotes.description: Wrap all string scalars in double quotes when formatting.

azurePipelineStudio.format.indent.description: Number of spaces to use for indentation when formatting YAML.

azurePipelineStudio.format.lineWidth.description: Preferred line width; set to 0 to disable wrapping.

azurePipelineStudio.format.noArrayIndent.description: Control whether sequences are indented in formatted YAML output.

azurePipelineStudio.format.sortKeys.description: Sort mapping keys alphabetically while formatting YAML.

azurePipelineStudio.format.stepSpacing.description: Add blank lines after each step in pipeline jobs for better readability.

azurePipelineStudio.refreshOnSave.description: Automatically refresh the rendered YAML view when the source file is saved.

azurePipelineStudio.resourceLocations.description: Map Azure DevOps repository resources to local directories that contain their templates.

endpoint.description: Optional endpoint/service connection used for matching (for example: 'ghe').

name.description: Optional repository name used for matching (for example: 'azure/pipeline-templates').

path.description: Local directory that mirrors the repository contents. Relative paths are resolved against the workspace folder.

ref.description: Optional ref or branch used for matching (for example: 'fix-sq-exclusion').

type.description: Optional repository type used for matching (for example: 'githubenterprise').

description: Azure DevOps Pipeline toolkit for rendering, formatting, and navigating YAML pipelines with template expansion.
name: azure-pipeline-studio

scripts.compile: java -jar /usr/local/lib/antlr-4.13.2-complete.jar -Dlanguage=JavaScript AzurePipelineParser.g4 AzurePipelineLexer.g4 -o generated -Xexact-output-dir -visitor && npx babel generated --out-dir generated-cjs
